title: Topic 001 Question 059
body: You have a Microsoft 365 E5 tenant that contains a user named User1. User1 is assigned the Compliance Administrator role.
User1 cannot view the regular expression in the IP Address sensitive info type.
You need to ensure that User1 can view the regular expression.
options: Assign User1 the Global Reader role.
Assign User1 to the Reviewer role group.
Instruct User to use the Test function on the sensitive info type.
Create a copy of the IP Address sensitive info type and instruct User1 to edit the copy.
